languages.text: "Расслабься. Кровавая паутина служит Вольному Торговцу, ткачи не станут вредить нам. Но знаешь... на всякий случай молись сегодня поусердней".
"Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."
languages.original_text: "Расслабься. Кровавая паутина служит Вольному Торговцу, ткачи не станут вредить нам. Но знаешь... на всякий случай молись сегодня поусердней".

traits.locale_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The weavers wouldn't harm us. But you know what, pray a little more fervently tonight just to be sure."
"Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The weavers wouldn't harm us. But you know what, pray a little more fervently tonight just to be sure."
"Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The weavers won't harm us.... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

"Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

languages.text: « Du calme. La Toile de Sang est au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Les tisseurs ne nous feront aucun mal... Mais bon, ça ne coûte rien de prier avec un peu plus de ferveur ce soir, juste au cas où. »
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

traits.locale_text: « Du calme. La Toile de Sang est au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Les tisseurs ne nous feront aucun mal... Mais bon, ça ne coûte rien de prier avec un peu plus de ferveur ce soir, juste au cas où. »

languages.text: «No te preocupes. La Red Sanguinolenta sirve a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sus tejedores no nos harán daño... pero tampoco vendría mal rezar con un poco más de devoción esta noche, por si acaso».
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

traits.locale_text: «No te preocupes. La Red Sanguinolenta sirve a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sus tejedores no nos harán daño... pero tampoco vendría mal rezar con un poco más de devoción esta noche, por si acaso».

languages.text: “别担心，织血罗网侍奉行商浪人，那些织网者绝对不会伤害我们……不过以防万一，你今晚的祈祷应该尽量更热忱些。”
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

traits.locale_text: “别担心，织血罗网侍奉行商浪人，那些织网者绝对不会伤害我们……不过以防万一，你今晚的祈祷应该尽量更热忱些。”

languages.text: 「落ち着け。ブラッドスパン・ウェブはローグトレーダーに仕えている。あいつらは私たちに危害を加えることはない…だが、念のため今夜はもう少し熱心に祈っておこう」
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着け。ブラッドスパン・ウェブはローグトレーダーに仕えている。あいつらは私たちに危害を加えることはない…だが、念のため今夜はもう少し熱心に祈っておこう」

languages.text: "Entspannt Euch. Das Blutgesponnene Netz dient {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Die Spinner werden uns nichts tun ... auch wenn es nicht schaden kann, heute Abend etwas inbrünstiger zu beten, nur zur Sicherheit."
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."

traits.locale_text: "Entspannt Euch. Das Blutgesponnene Netz dient {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Die Spinner werden uns nichts tun ... auch wenn es nicht schaden kann, heute Abend etwas inbrünstiger zu beten, nur zur Sicherheit."

languages.text: "Sakin ol. Kanipi Ağı, Hür Tacir'e hizmet ediyor. Dokurlar bize zarar vermez... Gerçi her ihtimale karşı bu gece biraz daha hevesli bir şekilde dua etmekten zarar gelmez."
languages.original_text: "Relax. The Bloodspun Web serves the Rogue Trader. The spinners won't harm us... though it wouldn't hurt you to pray a little more fervently tonight, just in case."
